SELECT WINE_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WINE VALUES (#{wineNo}, #{wineName}, #{grapeNo}, #{countryNo}, #{vintage}, #{price}, #{volume}, #{quantity}, #{content}, #{status})
mapper.select:
SELECT W.WINE_NO AS WINE_NO, WINE_NAME, W.GRAPE_NO AS GRAPE_NO, G.GRAPE_NAME, W.COUNTRY_NO AS COUNTRY_NO, C.COUNTRY_NAME, VINTAGE, PRICE, VOLUME, QUANTITY, CONTENT, STATUS,
ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME,
BODY, SWEET, BITTER, SOUR
FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN GRAPE G ON (G.GRAPE_NO=W.GRAPE_NO) LEFT JOIN COUNTRY C ON (C.COUNTRY_NO = W.COUNTRY_NO) LEFT JOIN WINE_IMAGE WI ON (WI.WINE_NO = W.WINE_NO) LEFT JOIN CHARACTERISTIC T ON (T.WINE_NO = W.WINE_NO) WHERE W.WINE_NO = #{wineNo}

SELECT W.WINE_NO, W.WINE_NAME, W.GRAPE_NO, W.COUNTRY_NO, W.VINTAGE, W.PRICE, W.VOLUME, W.QUANTITY, W.CONTENT, W.STATUS, WI.ORIGIN_NAME, WI.CHANGE_NAME, C.BODY, C.SWEET, C.BITTER, C.SOUR, G.GRAPE_NAME, CT.COUNTRY_NAME FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINE_IMAGE WI ON WI.WINE_NO = W.WINE_NO LEFT JOIN CHARACTERISTIC C ON C.WINE_NO = W.WINE_NO LEFT JOIN GRAPE G ON G.GRAPE_NO =W.GRAPE_NO LEFT JOIN COUNTRY CT ON CT.COUNTRY_NO=W.COUNTRY_NO WHERE W.STATUS = 'Y'
AND W.PRICE >= #{minPrice}
AND #{maxPrice}>= W.PRICE
AND (W.WINE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' OR W.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' OR TO_CHAR(W.VINTAGE) LIKE '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' OR G.GRAPE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' OR CT.COUNTRY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' )
ORDER BY W.PRICE DESC
ORDER BY W.PRICE ASC
ORDER BY W.WINE_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WINE W WHERE W.STATUS = 'Y'
AND (WINE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} ||'%')
ORDER BY W.PRICE DESC
ORDER BY W.PRICE ASC
ORDER BY W.WINE_NO DESC

SELECT W.WINE_NO AS WINE_NO, WINE_NAME, W.GRAPE_NO AS GRAPE_NO, G.GRAPE_NAME, W.COUNTRY_NO AS COUNTRY_NO, C.COUNTRY_NAME, VINTAGE, PRICE, VOLUME, QUANTITY, CONTENT, STATUS,
ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME,
BODY, SWEET, BITTER, SOUR
FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN GRAPE G ON (G.GRAPE_NO=W.GRAPE_NO) LEFT JOIN COUNTRY C ON (C.COUNTRY_NO = W.COUNTRY_NO) LEFT JOIN WINE_IMAGE WI ON (WI.WINE_NO = W.WINE_NO) LEFT JOIN CHARACTERISTIC T ON (T.WINE_NO = W.WINE_NO)
WHERE W.WINE_NO = #{wineNo}

SELECT W.WINE_NO, W.WINE_NAME, W.PRICE,
WI.ORIGIN_NAME,WI.CHANGE_NAME
FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINE_IMAGE WI ON(WI.WINE_NO=W.WINE_NO)
WHERE W.WINE_NO =#{wineNo}
